website_summaries.verdict: Chewbacca fans will have fun with this tribute to the beloved Star Wars character. Mask is on the smaller side, better suited for children than adults.
pros: Generates a variety of authentic Chewbacca sounds
Has a great novelty appeal for Halloween and other occasions
cons: Not large enough for adults to wear
Chin mechanism is difficult to use
Uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Tight for adult fans, but a terrific all-around mask for any fan.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is hilarious. Many adults can fit into it, although it was intended for children, and the fit is rather tight even at max capacity. There is a mechanism under the jaw area that makes pre-recorded Wookie sounds when you speak or move your jaw. The eyes are not shielded like the Kylo Ren mask, but there is a rubber nose rest that helps keep the mask secure and in place during use. The included batteries (2x AAA 1.5v Duracell alkaline) are cleverly hidden behind an easily accessible plastic panel at the top of the mask (only a Phillip's Screwdriver required to change them).
customer_reviews.author: Mark MasakiTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: For a very small face/head
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask after watching the viral video with a hysterical laughing mom wearing this mask. This mask has a solid construction. However, it is very small. It probably fits a five years old the most. If anyone older tries to wear it, it will cut either the chin or the forehead (your choice) due to its small size. I would have given it a five stars if it is bigger. Or, just avoid buying it knowing it is for very small children.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Fish

customer_reviews.title: This IS hysterical.
customer_reviews.text: This brought so much joy and laughter on Christmas with my family. My 58 year old mother wearing it and dancing around as Chewbacca was one of the most hilarious things I have seen in a while. Great for all ages!! Purchased for a 5 year old who had it on and working in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not great for kids younger than 6-7.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves Chewbacca so I thought this would be a great Christmas present for him. It is a cool mask with good sound effects, but my son was unable to make it work while wearing it. The sound functions when the person wearing it moves their chin by opening their mouth. Adjusting it to the smallest setting, the distance from the top of his head to his chin was not long enough to enable him to operate the mask to make noise. Cool mask but I would say ages 8 and up is more appropriate for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceMom

customer_reviews.title: ADD TO CART!
customer_reviews.text: When the entire family fights over this mask for a white elephant gift you know this is a great item to buy... just add it to cart! Stop reading their reviews... go... before they run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this for my nephew...this awesomeness that makes noise. To tell you the truth, I was definately going for the aunt/uncle giving sugar to the kids angle because it's wrong and it's funny. This was totally in the bucket of I figured my young nephew would love it last Christmas (since he loved the hulk hands that made noise) and it was a win. That and, it's Chewbacca! Not exactly screen ready for cosplay but awesome anyways.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Milner

customer_reviews.title: This mask is just as great as that Facebook lady put it out to be
customer_reviews.text: This mask is just as great as that Facebook lady put it out to be. :D It makes sounds when you open your mouth and it looks amazing. One downside is that it does not fit all heads like mine. I had to take out the chin guard in the mouth and even then it was a little too small. But that's nothing a few pieces of foam can't fix. It did fit my younger sister's face which is much smaller than mine though. So if you have a taller head then expect to do a bit of modification to it. But if not this still makes a great addition to any Star Wars collection.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Raaaaawr!
customer_reviews.text: As Chewbacca mom has said, "THIS IS WORTH EVERY PENNY!" However, buyer beware, this is not adequate for an adult. It must be different from the one she had because I had to remove the inside chin pad in order for me to be able to get it to fit me. I posted a video and picture. It worked well when I altered it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Yes. You do need it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. Very fun. I work in a hospital and wore it on Halloween. It scares small children, just a heads up in case you aren't looking to terrify kids. It's not something I use every day but it would be ok if I did. It's fun. I do wish it were a bit bigger. For adult sized children. :)
customer_reviews.author: TDK

customer_reviews.title: super small.
customer_reviews.text: i dont have a big face, dont know how chubby lady in youtube video did it unless this is a kids size. when i put it on, my chin keeps mouth open so after one chewy it stops talking, have to slide off face and put back on to make mouth open. was so excited to get this. Guess Ill have to give to my little kid lol. so as a kids toy its great, but come on.... us adults are the one that grew up with ol bacca... shame on you for making kids size... but seriously, at least advertise the size
customer_reviews.author: andrew puent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chewie mask for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hilarious, originally purchased as an adult Halloween costume accessory for my wife. I cannot stop laughing when she put it on for the first time on Halloween, but now it sits in our toy bin for the nieces/nephews when they come to visit. Without fail, it comes out every time and puts a smile on my face. Fun for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: kmcknight

customer_reviews.title: May the Laughter be with you!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I am sure we have all seen the "Chewbacca Mom" video! Purchased this for my young son who wanted to be Chewbacca for Halloween. It arrived quickly and he couldn't wait to try it on...It was better than great! The adjustable straps were comfortable and It fitted his face perfectly and roared/growled when he talked! We all took turns and had as much fun as "Chewbacca Mum" did!
customer_reviews.author: It's a zoo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wanted this mask since he saw the viral video on the internet. We came across it on Amazon and bought it. It was a little small for his head but he has a big head. I was able to wear it comfortably. It makes noise when you open your mouth. My dogs did not know what to think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Belladonna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca doesnt shut up
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didnt like is that it arrived making noise. Made noise every time you picked it up. Made noise in the gift bag.... there isnt a button to shut the dang thing off! I had to bring a screwdriver to my white elephant gift exchange so I could put batteries in after the fact so the noise wouldnt give it away.
customer_reviews.author: SQuint

customer_reviews.title: LOL
customer_reviews.text: It will make people laugh and animals hate you. Only gripe is it is way to small for any normal size adult. Now I know your thinking well this is a child's toy but.... let's be honest most of the people buying it are adults for themselves for the laughs which it will provide. There should have been an up sized version.
customer_reviews.author: Richard DeBlasio

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun to play around in!
customer_reviews.text: My husband originally bought for his streaming. Unfortunately it didn’t fit his face at all but luckily it fits mine okay. And while trying it on it kept making the sounds & my dog started barking at me. So I guess this will be used to let my dog chase me around lol
customer_reviews.author: J. Bijoux

customer_reviews.title: Better than Chewbacca mom hands down
customer_reviews.text: Ha! Got it for older daughter and what a laugh! Better than Chewbacca mom hands down! Couldn't talk we were laughing so hard. It might be old news now, but Christmas morning this was the last gift opened and after two hours of watching everyone tearing wrapping paper and pulling tape from their fingers, this kept us from insanity! Especially when she put her glasses on front so she could see us trying to get control back. Our Jack Russell about took her down with all the noise. Just made our morning!
customer_reviews.author: C Emery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask! Don’t hesitate, just order it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this mask!! Santa gave it to me for Christmas and I took it over to my parents for all to enjoy. I’m 45 and thought it was THE best!! The mask had everyone laughing and my son had a blast running around with it on. Don’t hesitate picking this mask up!! Great fun and just awesome!! Great job guys!
customer_reviews.author: SCMoose

customer_reviews.title: Twins love this!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son loves Star Wars (my husband is a huge Star Wars fan). He’s not allowed to watch the movies yet but we have lots of Star Wars books so he knows all the characters. I got this for him for Christmas and he absolutely loves it!! His twin sister loves it too. He shares with her and they take turns wearing the mask. The best part is the noise it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered This to go with my halloween costume. Loved it! However, I have a small head and can fit kids hats and it still fit a little snug on me. Definitely sized more for a child. It wasn’t a big deal since I was only wearing it a short time. I intended on giving it to my son after anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This is brilliant and so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure you've all seen the youtube video of the woman in this mask, just loving life. As soon as you put this mask on, it makes SO MUCH SENSE why she was so thrilled. The eye holes match up to my face just right, and the sound effects are amazing. When you open your mouth, it triggers sounds from the speakers located in the forehead of the mask. What's fantastic is that the sound byte doesn't cut off if your mouth remains open -- it continues to emit noise just as long as you have your jaw pressed into the sensor. It's fantastic~!
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Too little for adults
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a kids sized mask. I did buy it for my youngest son, but what dad doesn't like playing with toys? Unfortunately this awesome little mask did not fit me. The wife could barely squeeze her tiny little nugget into it. Overall a cool mask. Well made. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: NeptunusRex

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it will fit
customer_reviews.text: Its really cool looking and makes all kinds of sounds when the mouth opens. However it is for a very small face. Not too small. Was thinking because it cost so much it would be a little bit bigger. However we are going to keep it because he likes it and we don't have the box anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Samples

customer_reviews.title: Fun & cute - if it fits you
customer_reviews.text: So we got the mask for our 6 year old child for Christmas. The elastic strap that goes over the back of the head broke within 4 hours (the threading came undone). Of course, as with all masks, they are designed to fit a certain face shape. My child's face was too small to reach the internal chin rest and operate the sound effects.....and my husband's head was too long to fit inside the mask. Those issues aside, it's a fun gift and I would recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMcKinn

customer_reviews.title: Han Solo would be proud
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie. Got this because of the lady video laughing. Got it for my star wars fanatique friend. While he said it is a little too small for his adult face he puts it everyday and does Uber driving with it. He loves it. Customers love it so I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Smaller fit
customer_reviews.text: Tehya and I loved it and had a good laugh. It is funny because if you don't open the mouth of it all the way, it sounds like he is talking. It fits my daughter well, but you have to adjust the straps and loosen them in the back. It barely fit me, but I was able to get it on. Fun gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: HAHAHAHA
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these masks! One for me and then two for my girlfriends! We wear them when out driving around, on our dinner dates, just to make people laugh. It is sooo much fun. I just laugh at myself while wearing it. Best thing I have bought in 2020
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "get back" gift..
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO GOING TO GET MY 19 Y/O SON FOR BUYING THIS FOR HIS 8 Y/O LITTLE BROTHER! !! HIS AMUSEMENT AND FUN IS MY HUBBY AND I ANNOYANCES! !! PERFECT GIFT TO GET BACK AT YOUR PARENTS FOR WHATEVER REASON! !!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: This is fun. And brings a lot of laughter
customer_reviews.text: This is fun. And brings a lot of laughter. The only thing is it's definitely more child size then adult. If you have a longer face instead of a more round face it doesn't fit as well. In our family we have both so it was really easy to figure out. Both my husband and daughter have round faces and myself and my son have a more oval shape so it didn't fit as well on us and was harder to work
customer_reviews.author: Lorallee Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Great, but does not fit adult faces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gag gift for our adult male friend (who's not a really big guy) and it did not fit his face. My son who is 11 has enjoyed it though so we decided to keep it (that's him in the picture). So even though it says Ages 5 and up, I would say this is good for ages 5-12 years old. Not sized for adult faces.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stress relief for teacher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdaughter, a teacher with a couple more "difficult" children in her class this year & not a lot of help. She uses it to illustrate to students when behavior is unacceptable: "Ms. B is leaving now & will return when..." and Chewbacca then enters the room. She & kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Della McLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Good item bad packing and Shipping job.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but this was bought as a gift and the packaging was smashed to pieces and it looked like it was actually chewed on by a dog or something. Not pleased with the shape of the outside box the item was actually packed in.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRYLYNN

customer_reviews.title: ONLY for kids
customer_reviews.text: Having seen that viral video of the woman in the car with the wookiee mask I assumed this would be a great gag gift for a grown up but THIS one is only for kids in terms of size.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: HAHAHAHA
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is a Souse Chef along with a T-shirt for an event at work. It was a little small for him (he is a young adult & he will be 28 this year). The mask was great other them being a tad bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like the real thing!  Wookiee voice was so surprising!!'
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to not like! The roaring sounded like the movie version. It was a birthday gift for my 8yr granddaughter. It went over terrificly well. It the best present of the entire party! I even tried it on too🙃
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great child mask, workable adult mask with a little finagling.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Chewbacca mask, as others have mentioned, this is a child's mask, there are 2 screws on the bottom part to take out the chin guard which makes it a little more comfortable for an adult to wear, but then you have the issue of not always being able to move the mouth to make the sound. Other than that, this is an awesome Chewbacca mask!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Holycross

customer_reviews.title: Fun to be had with this mask.
customer_reviews.text: Children are scared by mask but then when they figure out it’s just a mask, they want to wear it. That doesn’t work- it’s really an adult only mask. It can hurt your nose and mouth if worn for awhile. Realistic in look and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with, mouth-piece a little small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask for my boyfriend's birthday as part of a Star Wars themed event we were attending. He absolutely LOVED it! The Chewbacca sounds are spot-on, and we had a blast laughing and trying it on! I gave the comfort feature 3 stars because while the mask fits an adult's face, the chin/mouth piece is just a tad too short to comfortably rest your chin in, which is what controls the mouth and sounds. Otherwise, it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love it. We all need them to make people smile.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my grandchildren but dibs was called by one of the adults in the house! Wow.. this is a super cute mask. You can't help but laugh when you see someone wearing it. The quality is nice. It is sturdy and has held up to several little ones battling over who gets to wear it next. You know it is a popular gift when you hear it and see it before dawn as the crew gets up for the day.
customer_reviews.author: sherwilson @ Simply Sherryl

customer_reviews.title: ChewbacHA!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, study. Has thicker adjustable straps on back to help w/ fit; one goes over the top of head and other around back of head. They do a good job holding the mask on well so it doesn't bounce around while running/moving. Out of the box it's ready to roar; I did not have to insert batteries My 4 yr old can use it and my wife can too....but she has a pea head. Sounds are loud, clear, and resemble the character well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Funny
customer_reviews.text: As others have said it is a bit small but it will fit a large head if maxed out though can be a bit tight. However, its worth it. It's super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Strait

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca Approved
customer_reviews.text: I wore it for my students and they loved it! Easy to put on and adjust. Makes noises just like Chewbacca. The plastic is hard and if you wear it for a while your face starts to sweat. Worth all the laughs you get though. I dropped it a couple times, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves it. The look, sound and build quality are great. I highly recommend it for any kids or collectors. Unfortunately it is not very comfortable but it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one each for my twin nieces and then turned around and bought another one for my daughter. They absolutely loved these. It was definitely a hit and pretty hilarious to watch them run around roaring at each other.
customer_reviews.author: Jemima Harrington

customer_reviews.title: A little big for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loved this gift. However, he will have to grow into it. His chin doesn't quite fit in the chin rest to activate the Chewbacca vocals. He still has fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this through amazon warehouse and what a deal. Brand new and only the box was a little crumpled up. Giving this to a kid who needs some holiday cheer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio SFO

customer_reviews.title: it is a fun mask.
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head/face and unfortunately, it does not fit. Not adjustable to facial size. You can only adjust the head strap at the back. Gladly it fits my kids and wife's face so they will inherit it. Other than that, it is a fun mask.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marfori

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, but does not fit the smaller faces of young children.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 5 year old Grandson for XMAS.. He loves it, but there is one minor detail- this mask is one size fits all, and his face is not big enough for him to operate the chin section to make noises. He has to move it with his hand! Adults quickly took the mask over and found it easy to use. Perfect for your Star Wars fan!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Simply amazing. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: IMO, this is the best of all the Star Wars electronic masks out right now. It doesn't try to change your voice. It has Chewie's voice when you open the mouth. Sure, it's a tad too small for my head, but I'm 40+ years old and this is made for kids! Ignore the other reviewers saying this is too small and hurts their forehead. Like I said, made for kids and not adults. My wife and I loved this so much that we bought another one for ourselves and another for a friend. We haven't laughed so hard about a toy ever. This mask is definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gag gift for my boyfriend for Christmas. It's hilarious. It is sized for children so you can't wear it for very long comfortably. The mask did arrive with noticeable scratches on the face, I don't really think this was a "brand new" item as described. Disappointed with this purchase. I wouldn't buy it again from Amazon, I would maybe buy it from a store in person so you can see what you're actually buying. Thanks Amazon for the disappointment
customer_reviews.author: abby k

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun and a great gift for any Star Wars fan. After seeing the Chewbacca mom video we had to get one and it does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: The Undietaker

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a white elephant gift. And I think everyone hates me now. Also it hurts your face. But when your drunk it’s funny as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly I  guess

customer_reviews.title: Laugh till you're sore
customer_reviews.text: It's just plain funny. We're Star Wars geeks, but it doesn't matter who you are, it's just fun to wear. Good quality, a little small for my head, but I'm a big guy. It was for my wife...se went and bought a wookie suit too just to go with the mask. Kids will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves it! She’s been wanting this mask since she saw that viral video of that lady with the mask. Nothing wrong with it perfect condition and brought noting but happiness
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Raaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw that funny video of the lady on YouTube testing this out and my boyfriend and I had a good laugh so I bought this for him as he’s a huge Star Wars fan. Love it! Arrived in perfect working condition, no damage to box.
customer_reviews.author: Lena D

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like the movie
customer_reviews.text: No better way to annoy your sibling than by gifting something that makes chewbacca noises to your nephew. The sounds are great. I love that the sounds are controlled by mouth movement and are quieter or louder depending on how much the mouth is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Mama.of.Mia

customer_reviews.title: 2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mask is extremely uncomfortable. Its to big for my 5 yr old and to small for me. When I do manage to get it on it literally crushes into my face and forehead. My son has to open the mouth with his hands when wearing cause its to big. It's seems to be an awkward fit in general. Its to bad because its funny and fun but its built so horribly that you never feel like using it. I definitely recommend going to a store and buying to see it first. I'm giving 2 stars and I feel like that's over rating it.
customer_reviews.author: KRF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, durable and sounded amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my a New Year “Star War” Party we were attending! It was sturdy, comfortable and sounded exactly like Chewbacca! We were very pleased with the purchase, and now the Grandchildren want to play with it constantly!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Studley

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked for my husband's costume party but sound effects didn't last long & a but uncomfortable to wear. Maybe better for kids or teens
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Slocombe

customer_reviews.title: Guess who’s Coming To Town?
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Once I received my two Chewbaca masks I totally fell in love with them. I couldn’t stop laughing like the infamous YouTuber video. I can hardly contain myself, because I know what’s coming on Xmas Eve night a barrage of unforgettable laughter!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Made to fit a child and not an adult
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old. This mask is made for a child so it’s very tight fitting for an adult. My kids have had so much fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmkaye

customer_reviews.title: Sized for a child or small adult, or maybe that guy with the skinny face
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool, I am an adult male so I had to take the chin insert out for it to fit my big melon. But that was totally easy. It's Shirley made for a child. It's pretty cool but sometimes I just want to talk with it on and not have it growl. I have to take the batt out to do that. No power switch. The growl is louder the farther you open the mouth. I love wearing it at work. I suspect I enjoy it more than my wife and kids
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas and we all have loved it. We have laughed and had a good time. Good quality good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: great product - made for small face
customer_reviews.text: unlike the Yoda or Darth vader talking mask, this one is very small and will be uncomefortable on an adult face. That being said, it is still a high quality product and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Auden

customer_reviews.title: This thing is probably awesome if your face fits it perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is probably awesome if your face fits it perfectly. Alas, mine does not so I can't fit my chin under the chin cup making it completely unwearable. When I would jam my giant face/chin under the cup, chewbacca would wail non-stop. That was kind of funny, but not really functional.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Flo

customer_reviews.title: You REALLY can do anything in this mask
customer_reviews.text: I just changed my 1 year old’s diaper while wearing this gem. About 5 seconds in, I realized the diaper changed from an uno to a deuce. While the difficulty went up significantly and there is no scent venting built in this particular model, my gagging and coughing were suppressed perfectly with the Chewbacca sound. My little girl laughed one of the hardest belly laughs of her life and the diaper change was a success. 5/5 all around.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Star Wars fans !
customer_reviews.text: So my kids love this ! I got it for my oldest but all three of them get a kick out this ! It’s very fun and durable but honestly uncomfortable which really isn’t a big deal since they don’t where is long periods. Overall totally worth it !
customer_reviews.author: AmyLyn1109

customer_reviews.title: !! Calling all Chewbacca fans !!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Star Wars fan, this is a must have! I bought it for my grandkids, but I wound up buying another one for them because the adults were hogging it! Haha! The sounds of Chewie are perfect! You want to laugh til your sides hurt? Then look no further. This is the item for you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane from California

customer_reviews.title: Of course this mask is a lot of fun. We bought two for each of our sons ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course this mask is a lot of fun. We bought two for each of our sons and they had fun making "Chewie" sounds. But like most things they lost interest after a short time. It is a cool mask, but just worried that they will not play with over a long period because you cannot actually talk with your voice like a Darth Vader mask, it just makes Chewie sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great for a specific sized head
customer_reviews.text: Great mask but I bought it for my husband and it didn’t work properly. His head was too big so it was constantly triggered. And it’s too big for our kids to trigger it. So I guess it’s mine now. Oh well :)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for adults lol
customer_reviews.text: The ad shows a grown man wearing it, thought I'd buy for dad. Dad says it is tight. But he loves it so he wants to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Everything I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the mask from the viral Chewbacca mom video. It's amazing. My only complaint, is that the mast seems too small/tight for my adult face, but is a tad big for my 5-year-old son. He struggles to move the mouth on his own, but he doesn't care and neither do it. It's still amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it! All the kids at the party took ...
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it! All the kids at the party took turns. Of course the adults did too but you can only do it for so long cause it's really fit for a child's face. But defiantly worth hurting my jaw for a few minutes for some laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very, very small. I don't understand how the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very, very small. I don't understand how the chewbacca lady was able to wear it. My husband who has a relatively small head for an adult couldn't tolerate wearing it as the plastic at the jaw line dug in to his jaw. I do understand its meant for children, so I'll still give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: InsomnoMom

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked for this for Christmas. It has provided hours of entertainment. Even the dog isn’t bothered by it. Definitely worth it just for the laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask!
customer_reviews.text: A little right for adult face but still fits. Love this!! My grandkids play with it and the neighbors kids love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously fun
customer_reviews.text: Bringing us as many laughs as we had hoped it would. Christmas gift for my 4 yr old grandson. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Shook

customer_reviews.title: Very small fit & hard plastic liner. Seller was great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask. It was a great hilarious gift. Everyone had to try it out including myself. The mask was so small (and I have a small face), that I could barely fit my face in in it. On top of that, the inside of the mask is made of thick, hard plastic and is extremely uncomfortable to wear more than a minute. These are the comments that were made by those who tried it on. The seller sent it on time and all things in that department were great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette B.

customer_reviews.title: Child's size very small.
customer_reviews.text: Well ages 5 and Up does not necessarily mean it fits everybody Age 5 and Up. It should say children's mask. Ages 5 to 12 I would say. Cuz I'm an adult and it's too uncomfortable to wear. Hilarious but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Grabow

customer_reviews.title: I’m 45 and bought this for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m a big kid.. I bought this mask. One for me and one for my best friend. We have had so much fun with them! Not just for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin House

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Mask is Good, except for the Straps are for small heads ( kids ) Shaped in a up side down T , I had to Remove the top of Head strap going down and just use the around the back of the head strap so it would fit .....
customer_reviews.author: patty pattison

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca Mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought the mask for my great grandkids, all boys, 5, 7 & 11 year olds. I put it on to scare my cat who wasn't impressed at all. But I was...the mask is made for a smaller face but made well and comfortable with adjusting straps for the little one. Can't wait for them to get it....maybe I won't?!! LOL It will offer hours of entertainment I'm sure, both for adults and the boys!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline A. Brendle

customer_reviews.title: Funny.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted this forever. Finally got it for a seven-year-old on his birthday. It was a hit with all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chewy we love you!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this. I took it to my sisters and we laughed so hard that she ordered 2 more to send to her daughter and son in law in another country. At first they looked at them and said why? Then they put them on. The magic happened, they couldn't stop laughing.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe58

customer_reviews.title: Cute and funny
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at Christmas! Too funny. Everyone wanted to play with it. we even made up games for it.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool not comfortable though
customer_reviews.text: This toy is really cool. The only downside is its not very comfortable around the nose area. My daughter will not even wear it alot bc of that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: All things Chewie
customer_reviews.text: He's been my favorite since I first saw him on the big screen. Now, I have him with me always!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great laugh for the holiday!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 y/o grand daughter. It was an instant hit with everyone from 5 to 65!! We laughed so hard & had a lot of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Chewie Mask a blast
customer_reviews.text: Any Star Wars fan would love to goof off with this Chewbacca mask. Great Chewie sound effect and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Isa & JP Thorson

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: It totally smashes the nose area, but other than that it is great. I love the noises it makes when you move your mouth and everyone got a big kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bodi

customer_reviews.title: This mask is so much fun! The Chewy noises are hilarious
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so much fun! The Chewy noises are hilarious. When I wore it I ended up sliding it up often because I needed to talk. I wouldn't want to wear it for an extended period of time. It is a hard plastic that can be uncomfortable after several minutes. My 7 year tried it on and was able to wear it comfortably. I would recommend it for any Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This mask was such a hit on Halloween! It is more of a kids' size, but it worked for me. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: FUN MASK
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is really enjoying the mask! Lol! I really enjoy watching him scaring people with the mask. It's hysterical!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: This was lots of fun to use. We've had lots of fun with it. Because it's a hard mask it isn't overly comfortable to wear. It's a little small so it probably fits better on children without much discomfort. It would be great if they made different sizes. The length between the eye holes and mouth are fixed so for some with longer faces would be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B

customer_reviews.title: Great and Funny!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our nephew. He hated it and was terrified. But our niece, his younger sister, LOVES it and plays with it all the time. She tries to feed it her food. Its cute. I really should have just kept it though because I think we loved it more... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jilly Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love these, so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephews and they loved them. Of course if I had known they would have to fight their dad to play with them I would have bought him one as well. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! SO FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 6 year old as an early Christmas gift (well, he saw it so I had no choice- HA). He loves it! It works really well! The design is impressive and it seems really sturdy (it has already survived a few drops). This is a great toy for the Star Wars lover. I think I have played with it more than anyone because I think it is hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Fun
customer_reviews.text: We saw a YouTube video with this mask and how much fun the lady was having with the mask. So we purchased one so it would be delivered before a Christmas party. It was the life of the party. Quality ok, but the fun you will have with it makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a hilarious and fun toy. If you havent seen the youtube video ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a hilarious and fun toy. If you havent seen the youtube video of the woman getting one at kohl's you should check it out. However, it is definitely a child's fit. An adult cant wear it and make it work well. Maybe this is obvious that it is a childs toy. We got it for an adult and it just didnt work. But, it is still fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Family loved the Chewbacca mask. Makes noises when you move your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Banana

product_meta.title: Star Wars Movie Roaring Chewbacca Wookiee Sounds Mask, Funny GRAAAAWR Noises, Sound Effects, Ages 5 and up, Brown (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

 A mask worth roaring over! The Roaring Chewbacca Wookiee Mask lets you channel your inner Wookiee and let out a mighty Chewbacca GRRRWAAAR! One of the most iconic characters in the expansive Star Wars galaxy, Chewbacca is a loyal friend and ally who roars into action alongside Han Solo, Princess Leia, and Luke Skywalker! With this adjustable mask that fits most head sizes (sorry, Jabba), you’re ready to be like the mightiest Wookiee in the Star Wars galaxy! So open your mouth and let the GRWWWAAAAR out! Wookiee sound FX included; Wookiee attitude sold separately.
feature_bullets: AS HEARD IN THE STAR WARS MOVIES - Roar into intergalactic action with the roar-ready Roaring Chewbacca Wookiee Mask, with sounds inspired by the iconic Wookiee and the sounds of his roars from the Star Wars movies
A CHEWBACCA MASK WORTH ROARING OVER! Kids can can open wide and say RAAARR like the loyal friend of Han Solo and co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon, with the Roaring Chewbacca Wookie toy mask

AUTHENTIC WOOKIEE SOUND FX - This electronic mask is equipped with authentic Wookiee sound FX and activated by opening your mouth wide! It's easy to sound like a Star Wars character when you wear the Roaring Chewbacca Wookie mask and make the best Chewbacca noise ever. Mom’s agree: Chewbacca is the greatest Wookiee ever

AS SEEN ON SOCIAL MEDIA, TV… AND THE BIG SCREEN - This Roaring Chewbacca Wookiee mask, based on the furry hero himself, has everything but the matted fur! From the snows of Hoth to morning talk shows, Chewbacca’s roar has reached intergalactic fame from a galaxy far, far away to your galaxy right at home
LAUGH IT UP, FUZZBALL – “But Mom, I want to be a Wookiee!” Good thinking, kid. This awesome mask comes with everything you need to sound like everyone's favorite Wookie

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
